thread.section_title: TackleDirect Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TackleDirect | www.tackledirect.com | 2 of 122
thread.title: Thomas Hewston

author: Thomas Hewston
title: Thomas Hewston
text: I was disappointed that the product I ordered was back ordered. They kept me informed and updated me on the status of the back order. Had a little chuckle when they sent me a coupon for 10% off my order of 200 $ or more for my inconvenience that expired in a few days. Love tackle direct, despite their less than Nobel attempt at satisfying their back order issue.
